languages.text: "Ты избрал{mf||а} неверный путь, мон-кай — путь боли и отчаяния. Прощай".

traits.locale_text: "Ты избрал{mf||а} неверный путь, мон-кай — путь боли и отчаяния. Прощай".

languages.text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."
languages.original_text: "Ты избрал{mf||а} неверный путь, мон-кай — путь боли и отчаяния. Прощай".

traits.locale_text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."
"You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."
"You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."
"You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."

languages.text: 「誤った道を選ぶか、モン＝ケイ――苦痛と絶望の道を。お別れだ」
languages.original_text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: 「誤った道を選ぶか、モン＝ケイ――苦痛と絶望の道を。お別れだ」

languages.text: “你选择了错误的道路，猴子。你选择了痛苦和绝望的道路，永别了。”
languages.original_text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: “你选择了错误的道路，猴子。你选择了痛苦和绝望的道路，永别了。”

languages.text: «Has elegido la senda incorrecta, mon-keigh, la del dolor y la desesperación. Adiós».
languages.original_text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: «Has elegido la senda incorrecta, mon-keigh, la del dolor y la desesperación. Adiós».

languages.text: "Ihr habt den falschen Pfad gewählt, Chem-Pan-Sey – den Pfad von Schmerz und Verzweiflung. Lebt wohl!"
languages.original_text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt den falschen Pfad gewählt, Chem-Pan-Sey – den Pfad von Schmerz und Verzweiflung. Lebt wohl!"

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|engagé|engagée} sur la voie de la douleur et du désespoir, mon-keigh. Un bien mauvais choix. Adieu. »
languages.original_text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|engagé|engagée} sur la voie de la douleur et du désespoir, mon-keigh. Un bien mauvais choix. Adieu. »

languages.text: "Yanlış yolu seçtin mon-keigh. Acı ve ızdırabın yolunu seçtin. Elveda."
languages.original_text: "You have chosen the wrong path, mon-keigh — the path of pain and despair. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "Yanlış yolu seçtin mon-keigh. Acı ve ızdırabın yolunu seçtin. Elveda."
